prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that looks like a haunted coral with an ethereal glow.
Show me a spooky Pokemon that has a unique body shape resembling a jellyfish.
Design a Pokemon with an icy blue color scheme and ghostly features for Halloween.
Imagine a Pokemon with flowing tentacle-like arms and a haunting presence.
Generate a whimsical creature that embodies the essence of both water and ghost types.
Make a Pokemon that has a snowy aesthetic and mysterious allure, perfect for a fairy tale.
Give me a Pokemon that has a minimalistic design but a powerful aura of ghostly energy.
